major for me

The set of markers that are shown is now no longer hard coded. Every marker
contributor can define default values whether it should show up
- in the overview ruler
- text
- go to next/previous annotation action

The user will then be able to change those values for the text and Java editor
via preferences.

see org.eclipse.ui.workbench.texteditor/markerAnnotationSpecification extension
point for more details.
